name: 陳凱瀛
objective:
本課程主要透過論文報告、團體討論、演講等活動，使學生熟悉特定研究領域相關之工程技術及應用。
This course mainly aims to familiarize students with engineering techniques and applications related to specific research field through activities such as research reports, group discussions, and speeches.
